      • addItem

        public void addItem(ItemInstance it)
        Adds the supplied item to the inventory. If the inventory is full, nothing will happen.
        Parameters:
        it - if null, nothing will happen

      • isFull

        public boolean isFull()
        Returns whether the inventory is full
        Returns:
        true if full

      • getItem

        public ItemInstance getItem(int slot)
        Returns item at slot.
        Parameters:
        slot - Supplied slot. All slots are numbered 0 through X
        Returns:

      • removeItem

        public void removeItem(int slot)
        Removes item in slot
        Parameters:
        slot - Supplied slot. All slots are numbered 0 through X

      • removeItem

        public void removeItem(ItemInstance item)
        Looks for ItemInstance and removes it from the inventory
        Parameters:
        item - Item to be removed, nothing happens if not found
